label: clinical_signal_03_dx_renal_biomarker_study_008
content:
## 2024-04-22 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 73
- Active: 70
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 18
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 3

### Enrollment by Cohort
- 10mg: 14
- 25mg: 18
- 50mg: 20
- 100mg: 21

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: RB-AE-0866, Description: fatigue, Grade: 2, Relatedness: not related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 10mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-0861, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: not related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 100mg

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: RB-PD-0841, Description: Missed scheduled renal ultrasound, rescheduled, Severity: moderate

### Events
- Cohort 100mg enrollment status reviewed at sponsor call
- Drug supply reconciliation completed at 40 sites
- Cohort 50mg enrollment status reviewed at sponsor call

### Notes
- Week 8: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 73 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
